claim: Flublok ensures identical antigenic match with WHO- and FDA-selected flu strains.

failed_snippets.quote: Flublok contains recombinant HA proteins of the three strains of inﬂuenza virus speciﬁed by health authorities for inclusion in the annual seasonal vaccine.
failed_snippets.relevance_explanation: This quote directly states that Flublok contains the hemagglutinin (HA) proteins from the three influenza virus strains specified by health authorities (such as WHO and FDA) for the annual vaccine, supporting the claim that Flublok ensures an identical antigenic match with the selected strains.
